## Events.ViewportChange class

Notifies listeners that the workspace surface's position or scale has changed.

Does not notify when the workspace itself resizes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ViewportChange extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events.uibase.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [oldScale?](./blockly.events.viewportchange.oldscale.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The previous scale of the workspace. |
|  [scale?](./blockly.events.viewportchange.scale.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The scale of the workpace. |
|  [type](./blockly.events.viewportchange.type.md) |  | EventType |  |
|  [viewLeft?](./blockly.events.viewportchange.viewleft.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The left edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [viewTop?](./blockly.events.viewportchange.viewtop.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Top edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the workspace origin. |
